Welcome to Advection's documentation!
======================================

A lightweight Python toolkit for diagnosing **horizontal and vertical
advection** and correcting the **energy-balance closure gap** in
30-minute eddy-covariance data from Campbell Scientific *IRGASON* and
similar open-path systems.
